participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and imaginative, I enjoy exploring new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: I love to spend time with my cat on the weekends. I am a professional skittles player. I listen to music and read books to take my mind off things. I love to ride my bike on the weekend. I am the youngest sibling in my family.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Outgoing and friendly, I thrive in social situations and enjoy meeting new people.
participant_2.background: I need someone who shares my love of the outdoors. I'm a healthy weight for my height and build. I'm doing well in school, but I wish the weather was warmer. I remember reading books in the car with my dad when we were going on long road trips. I am a truck driver in the south.

content.text: Hey whats up
Not much, just got out of school. How about you?
Not much, just finished up a game of basketball.
Oh cool. I dont really like sports.
What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go out and explore new places, especially in nature.
Oh nice, me too! I love hiking and camping.
I love those too! I also like to go kayaking.
That sounds really fun. I've never been kayaking before.
You should try it sometime! It's a lot of fun.
I will! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What else do you like to do?
I like to read, listen to music, and watch movies.
Oh cool. I like to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I like a lot of different kinds of books, but I especially like fantasy and science fiction.
Oh nice. I like those too! What are some of your favorite authors?
I like Brandon Sanderson, Patrick Rothfuss, and Neil Gaiman.
Oh cool. I've read some of Brandon Sanderson's books. I really liked Mistborn.
Mistborn is my favorite book of his!
Oh nice! I've also read some of Patrick Rothfuss's books. I really liked the Kingkiller Chronicle.
The Kingkiller Chronicle is so good! I'm waiting for the third book to come out.
Me too! I'm so excited to see how it ends.
